com.stefansator.mensaplan

Class HistoryRecyclerViewAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<HistoryViewHolder>
      • com.stefansator.mensaplan.HistoryRecyclerViewAdapter

  • public class HistoryRecyclerViewAdapter
extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<HistoryViewHolder>
    Adapter for managing HistoryViewHolder Objects. Creates and returns new ViewHolder Objects on Request to the RecyclerView or fills them on request with the appropriate data.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  HistoryRecyclerViewAdapter.ItemSelectedListener
      Interface for implementing a listener for item selection.
